item.title: How i make my server online? please help me
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:5, topic:420895”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=523568.msg3808318#msg3808318 date=1320681423]
Ftp… (facepalm)

I’m going to say this once, don’t ask any questions because i will not answer them

First: PORTFORWARD and if you don’t know how to do that, give up now.
Second: Make an exception in your fire wall for Port 43594
Third: Put the IP or no-ip in your client.java…
[/quote]

Cut the shit. You don’t need to be such an ass just because they’re new. Everyone needs to start somewhere just as you had to. The only reason I am not going to help is because he can just search for all of these answers.

Or just Buy an VPS. Much easyer, and alot more stable.

Bad idea, he is just starting out and there is no need for a VPS when you’re just learning. That’s just a waste of money, and just because some people can afford them doesn’t mean everyone can.[/quote]
Hmm true…

Read full topic
item.source: How i make my server online? please help me

I’m going to say this once, don’t ask any questions because i will not answer them

First: PORTFORWARD and if you don’t know how to do that, give up now.
Second: Make an exception in your fire wall for Port 43594
Third: Put the IP or no-ip in your client.java…[/quote]

Cut the shit. You don’t need to be such an ass just because they’re new. Everyone needs to start somewhere just as you had to. The only reason I am not going to help is because he can just search for all of these answers.

pot up pls:

Or just Buy an VPS. Much easyer, and alot more stable.

Bad idea, he is just starting out and there is no need for a VPS when you’re just learning. That’s just a waste of money, and just because some people can afford them doesn’t mean everyone can.

item.title: How i make my server online? please help me
item.dc:creator: @Skillet_001 Skillet 001
item.description:
@Skillet_001 wrote:

Go to
http://www.portforward.com/
to portforward choose your router and type.
Then once completed put your IP into the client save and compile
also put the ip into your server so it will be ONLINE then once completed upload your client with
the IP in it.
Play It!

Read full topic
